title: Peacock Schedule February 17-23 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for February 17-23 2025 include the season finale of Love Island All Stars Season 2, and a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. February 19 brings Love Island All Stars Season 2’s finale to Peacock. Maya Jama, who hosted other Love Island shows, hosts this series as well. […] The post Peacock Schedule February 17-23 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Peacock's schedule for February 17-23 2025 and the movies and tv shows releasing in the week, can be found here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for February 17-23 2025 include the season finale of Love Island All Stars Season 2, and a new episode of The Traitors Season 3. February 19 brings Love Island All Stars Season 2’s finale to Peacock. Maya Jama, who hosted other Love Island shows, hosts this series as well. Moreover, it is narrated by Iain Stirling. The contestants of the series comprise former contestants from other Love Island shows. Additionally, on February 20, a new episode of The Traitors Season 3 drops on the streaming platform. The Traitors is a reality game show hosted by Alan Cumming. In this game show, the contestants known as Faithfuls work together to build a prize fund worth $250,000. Meanwhile, a select few contestants called Traitors try to disrupt the work of the Faithfuls and eliminate them in order to claim the prize money. Also releasing on Peacock this week is The Real Housewives of Potomac, Season 9 Reunion episode. This special episode will see the cast reunite and discuss the important events that took place during the season. Gizelle Bryant, Karen Huger, Ashley Darby, Wendy Osefo, Mia Thornton, Stacey Rusch, and Keiarna Stewart make up the main cast. New Peacock releases for February 17-23 2025 Peacock is adding the following movies and television shows to its library between February 17-23 2025. February 17 The Real Housewives of Potomac, Season 9 – Reunion (Bravo) February 18 Philly Homicide, Season 1 – All Episodes (Oxygen) February 19 La Jefa, Season 1 (Telemundo)  Love Island All Stars, Season 2 – Finale (Peacock Exclusive) February 20 The Traitors, Season 3 – New Episode, 60 min February 23 The Wish Swap For more Peacock content, check out the Twisted Metal Season 2 teaser trailer here. Also, here is when Long Bright River will come out online.
html:
Peacock‘s new TV and movie releases for February 17-23 2025 include the season finale of Love Island All Stars Season 2, and a new episode of The Traitors Season 3.

February 19 brings Love Island All Stars Season 2’s finale to Peacock. Maya Jama, who hosted other Love Island shows, hosts this series as well. Moreover, it is narrated by Iain Stirling. The contestants of the series comprise former contestants from other Love Island shows.

Additionally, on February 20, a new episode of The Traitors Season 3 drops on the streaming platform. The Traitors is a reality game show hosted by Alan Cumming. In this game show, the contestants known as Faithfuls work together to build a prize fund worth $250,000. Meanwhile, a select few contestants called Traitors try to disrupt the work of the Faithfuls and eliminate them in order to claim the prize money.

Also releasing on Peacock this week is The Real Housewives of Potomac, Season 9 Reunion episode. This special episode will see the cast reunite and discuss the important events that took place during the season. Gizelle Bryant, Karen Huger, Ashley Darby, Wendy Osefo, Mia Thornton, Stacey Rusch, and Keiarna Stewart make up the main cast.

New Peacock releases for February 17-23 2025

Peacock is adding the following movies and television shows to its library between February 17-23 2025.

February 17

  • The Real Housewives of Potomac, Season 9 – Reunion (Bravo)

February 18

  • Philly Homicide, Season 1 – All Episodes (Oxygen)

February 19

  • La Jefa, Season 1 (Telemundo) 
  • Love Island All Stars, Season 2 – Finale (Peacock Exclusive)

February 20

  • The Traitors, Season 3 – New Episode, 60 min

February 23

  • The Wish Swap

For more Peacock content, check out the Twisted Metal Season 2 teaser trailer here. Also, here is when Long Bright River will come out online.
